name: Panel Build
description: Rebuild panel dist/ from source (vite build)
dry_run_command: $panelSrc = Join-Path '{BOND_ROOT}' 'panel\src'; $panelDist = Join-Path '{BOND_ROOT}' 'panel\dist'; if (Test-Path $panelDist) { $distTime = (Get-Item $panelDist).LastWriteTime; $changed = Get-ChildItem $panelSrc -Recurse -File | Where-Object { $_.LastWriteTime -gt $distTime }; if ($changed.Count -gt 0) { Write-Host "Build needed: $($changed.Count) source file(s) modified since last build."; $changed | Select-Object -First 10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "  [MODIFIED] $($_.FullName.Replace('{BOND_ROOT}\',''))" } } else { Write-Host 'No source changes detected since last build.' } } else { Write-Host 'No dist/ directory found. Full build needed.' }
